meanings.definition: Having the most twists or turns.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster had the twistiest track in the amusement park.
meanings.sent2: The road through the mountains is known for being one of the twistiest in the region.
meanings.sent3: The twistiest part of the story was when the hero turned out to be the villain all along.
meanings.sent4: Her mind took the twistiest path to solve the puzzle, surprising everyone with the solution.
meanings.sent5: The twistiest maze at the fair was challenging but exciting to navigate.

meanings.sent1: She made the twistiest pretzel I've ever seen at the baking competition.
meanings.sent2: The twistiest straw in the pack was perfect for sipping on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The twistiest ribbon on the gift made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: His words took the twistiest route to explain a simple concept, confusing everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The twistiest path to success is often filled with unexpected challenges.
